content: sizes again re-establish working in rounds next row rs k9 11 12 heel sts with an empty needle knit remaining 9 11 12 sts and with that same needle pick up and knit 16 16 17 sts along the selvage edge of heel flap working into sl sts next needle n2 work in patt next needle n3 work in patt next needle n4 pick up and knit 16 16 17 sts along the selvage edge of heel flap working into sl sts k9 11 12 sts beg of round is now at center of heel place a marker if desired return to working in rnds ~ 82 90 98 sts knit 1 round even gusset shaping round 1 n1 knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 n2 and n3 work in patt n4 k1 ssk knit to end ~ 2 sts decrease d round 2 knit all sts on each needle repeat rnds 1 and 2 8 8 8 more times ~ 64 72 80 sts work even in patt until foot measures approx 4 5 5 5 cm/ 1½ 2 2¼ ins less than desired foot length ending with either round 1 or round 2 of established patt toe shaping round 1 n1 knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 n2 k1 ssk knit to end n3 knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 n4 k1 ssk knit to end ~ 4 sts decrease d round 2 knit repeat rnds 1 and 2 9 11 12 more times until 24 sts rem ~ 6 sts on each needle on last round using n4 knit across n1 sts then slip n2 sts onto n3 ~ 12 sts on each of 2 needles finishing using kitchener st graft 12 sts on n4 and n3 together weave in ends and lightly block repeat pattern instructions for second sock abbreviations rem remain ing approx approximately repeat repeat beg begin ning round s round s cm centimeter s sk2p slip 1 k2tog pass slip st over k2tog in s inch es sl slip k knit ssk slip slip knit 2 sl sts decrease k2tog knit 2 sts decrease st st stockinette stitch m meter s st s stitch es mm millimeter s decrease together p purl ws wrong side p2tog purl 2 sts decrease yd s yard s patt pattern repeat inside instructions a specified number pwise purlwise of times page 4 of 4 rs right side © sachiko burgin 2020 sachikoburgin@gmail com needleleafknits com pattern is for personal use copy and images cannot
